articles.title: Stingray Sand 'Sculpture' on South Africa's Coast May Be World's Oldest - Ancient Origins
articles.description: South Africa’s Cape south coast offers many hints about how our human ancestors lived some 35,000 to 400,000 years ago during the Pleistocene epoch.
articles.content:
By Charles Helm & Alan Whitfield/The Conversation
